document_data.name: Lord Sage of Phlan
document_data.mainbody: The '''Lord Sage of Phlan''' was a sage in [[Phlan]] in [[1489 DR]].
document_data.Personality: The Lord was a taciturn and reserved individual. He was slow to show his emotions but despised troubles in his library.
document_data.Activities: The Lord Sage was the caretaker of [[Mantor's Library]] in Phlan, who was accompanied by his second-in-command [[Cassra Brandywine]].{{Cite adventurers league/The Courting of Fire|7-8}} In his free time he studied [[Denlor's Tower]]{{Cite adventurers league/Dark Pyramid of Sorcerer's Isle|7}}
